attributes.action: support and encourage the country sport of fruit beating.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This once great activity once once enjoyed by thousands of country folk, around Britain and has slipped into obscurity. We want once again to rally to the Saturday morning call to "get the sticks and let's go FRUIT BEATING!"

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
